name: waesucks
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of great sadness or disappointment: As Burns wrote: Waesucks! for him that gets nae lass.
More examplesFewer examples"Waesucks." "What?" he said . "You don't know what waesucks means?"Waesucks means something like "Alas!".Waesucks! Oh, the pity!Waesucks is a Scots word.
